# Manual QA for  # 

[Checklist]

### Static checks

-  [ ]   sizes of columns 
-  [ ]   order of columns 
-  [ ]   header menu content 
-  [ ]   shadow of columns
-  [ ]   borders of the table 
-  [ ]   fonts of the table   
-  [ ]   layout of the table

### Dynamic checks

-  [ ]   table elements while scrolling
-  [ ]   table elements while zooming
-  [ ]   table elements while hover and focus
-  [ ]   changing display of table content while resizing
-  [ ]   table shadows while resizing
